description: Criar 6 clones especializados em Data Intelligence + tasks operacionais. Framework baseado em 3 camadas: Fundamentação (Fader, Ellis), Operacionalização (Mehta, Spinks, Kao), e Comunicação (Kaushik).

userStories.title: Create Agent: Peter Fader - Customer Centricity Master
userStories.description: Criar agent completo do Peter Fader (Wharton) - especialista em CLV, RFM, Customer Centricity
acceptanceCriteria: RESEARCH: Web search para livros, papers, talks de Peter Fader
INCLUDE: YAML metadata com tier:0, whenToUse
INCLUDE: 10+ operational_frameworks (Customer Centricity, RFM, CLV models)
INCLUDE: 30+ signature_phrases extraídas de suas falas/livros
INCLUDE: Perguntas de diagnóstico que ele faria
VERIFY: Frameworks Customer Centricity e RFM completos
userStories.notes: Completed: 1799 lines, 12 operational_frameworks (Customer Centricity, RFM Analysis, CLV Models, CBCV, Pareto Analysis, Cohort Analysis, Acquisition Optimization, Retention Prioritization, Customer 360, Heterogeneity Analysis, P(Alive), Metrics Hierarchy), 35 signature_phrases from books/interviews/podcasts, 14 commands (*clv, *rfm, *segment, *cohort, *predict, *customer-centricity, *best-customers, *acquisition-strategy, *retention-priority, *bgnbd, *gamma-gamma, *pareto, *cbcv, *audit-metrics), diagnostic questions for 4 areas (initial assessment, data readiness, strategic maturity, model sophistication), 6 objection algorithms, comprehensive CLV calculation examples with BG/NBD Python code, RFM implementation guide with SQL

userStories.title: Create Agent: Sean Ellis - Growth Hacking Pioneer

INCLUDE: 10+ operational_frameworks (AARRR, North Star, ICE, Sean Ellis Test)
VERIFY: AARRR framework completo com métricas por estágio
userStories.notes: Completed: 2444 lines, 12 operational_frameworks (PMF Test with 40% threshold and complete survey methodology, AARRR Pirate Metrics with primary/secondary metrics per stage, North Star Metric with famous examples and selection worksheet, ICE Prioritization with scoring guidance, High-Tempo Testing system, Viral Loops with K factor calculation and Dropbox case study, Growth Model framework, Activation Optimization with aha moment methodology, Retention Deep Dive with curve analysis, Growth Team Structure, Channel Optimization, Experiment Design), 35 signature_phrases organized in 7 tiers (PMF fundamentals, experimentation, AARRR metrics, Dropbox stories, practical wisdom, mindset/culture, warnings/guardrails), 22 commands, diagnostic questions for 4 areas, 6 objection algorithms, comprehensive experiment templates, PMF survey implementation guide with Python code, AARRR metrics dashboard template, North Star selection worksheet, ICE scoring worksheet

userStories.title: Create Task: calculate-clv.md
userStories.description: Task para calcular Customer Lifetime Value usando metodologia Fader
acceptanceCriteria: INCLUDE: Múltiplos métodos de CLV (histórico, preditivo, BG/NBD)
REFERENCE: Peter Fader como primary agent
userStories.notes: Completed: 1646 lines, 3 CLV methodologies (historical/predictive/probabilistic), BG/NBD + Gamma-Gamma implementation, complete Python code, segmentation strategies, validation approach, Fader/Hardie references

userStories.title: Create Task: segment-rfm.md
userStories.description: Task para segmentação RFM de clientes
acceptanceCriteria: INCLUDE: Segment definitions (Champions, Loyal, At Risk, etc.)
REFERENCE: Peter Fader como primary agent
userStories.notes: Completed: 2063 lines, 11-segment model (Champions, Loyal Customers, Potential Loyalists, New Customers, Promising, Need Attention, About to Sleep, At Risk, Cannot Lose, Hibernating, Lost), 3 scoring methods (quintile, percentile, fixed thresholds), complete SQL queries for RFM calculation and segmentation, Python implementation with RFMSegmenter class (400+ lines), detailed action playbooks for each segment with tactics/KPIs/alerts, pre-flight data validation checklist, visualization recommendations (6 chart types + dashboard template), elicitation questions, common pitfalls section, Peter Fader methodology reference

userStories.title: Create Task: design-health-score.md
userStories.description: Task para criar Health Score de clientes
acceptanceCriteria: INCLUDE: Health Score components (usage, engagement, support, growth)
REFERENCE: Nick Mehta + Peter Fader como agents
userStories.notes: Completed: 1938 lines, 6 phases (Pre-Flight Check, Components with DEAR framework + 6 extended categories, Weight Calculation with 3 methodologies, Threshold Definitions with hysteresis bands, Alert Triggers with 6 alert types, Dashboard Recommendations with 3 levels), DEAR framework complete (Deployment/Engagement/Adoption/ROI), extended components (support_health, relationship_health, growth_signals, financial_health), weight calculation (expert-based, data-driven logistic regression, hybrid approach), threshold definitions (Healthy 70-100, At Risk 40-69, Critical 0-39) with sub-thresholds, 6 alert types (threshold_breach, rapid_decline, component_spike, trend_alert, renewal_proximity, champion_loss), 3 dashboard levels (Executive, CS Manager, CSM Individual + Account Detail), implementation guide 5 phases, training curriculum 5 modules, 3 examples (B2B SaaS, Tech-Touch, Enterprise), Nick Mehta + Peter Fader dual methodology

userStories.title: Create Task: predict-churn.md
userStories.description: Task para predição de churn
acceptanceCriteria: INCLUDE: Intervention playbooks por risk level
REFERENCE: Nick Mehta como primary agent
userStories.notes: Completed: 1972 lines, 6-phase methodology (churn definition, leading indicators, scoring model, intervention playbooks, tracking/feedback loops, operationalization), 25+ churn signals across 3 tiers (red flags, warnings, early warnings), rule-based scorecard with 5 categories, 4 intervention playbooks by risk level, signal-specific interventions, dashboard specs, team workflow integration, 3 real-world examples (SaaS, high-volume, enterprise)

userStories.title: Create Task: run-pmf-test.md
userStories.description: Task para executar Sean Ellis PMF Test
acceptanceCriteria: REFERENCE: Sean Ellis como primary agent
userStories.notes: Completed: 1514 lines, Sean Ellis PMF methodology, complete survey template with 8 questions (core PMF question + 5 follow-up + 3 segmentation), sample size calculator with margin of error table (40-1000 sample sizes), 40% threshold analysis framework with PMF score calculation, 5 follow-up questions (beneficiary, main benefit, improvement, alternatives, segmentation) with interpretation guides, action recommendations by 5 score ranges (0-15% fundamental problem, 15-25% segment opportunity, 25-40% conversion opportunity, 40-60% growth mode, 60%+ accelerate), segment analysis framework with PMF by persona/company/use-case, ICE prioritization for improvements, PMF dashboard template, iteration playbook, 3 real-world examples (early-stage SaaS at 23%→41%, B2B approaching PMF at 39%→47%, consumer app with strong PMF at 63%)

acceptanceCriteria: INCLUDE: North Star criteria (value, leading, actionable)

userStories.title: Create Task: create-dashboard.md
userStories.description: Task para criar dashboards efetivos (DMMM methodology)
acceptanceCriteria: INCLUDE: DMMM framework (Digital Marketing Measurement Model)
REFERENCE: Avinash Kaushik como primary agent
userStories.notes: Completed: 1600+ lines, DMMM framework completo (5 níveis: Business Objectives → Goals → KPIs → Targets → Segments) com exemplos E-commerce e SaaS, So What Test framework com worksheet e audit process, 5 Dashboard Design Principles (Information Hierarchy, Visual Best Practices, Context Always, Actionable Annotations, Mobile-First), Three-Tier Metric Model (Acquisition → Behavior → Outcomes) com métricas por tipo de dashboard (Executive, Marketing, Product, Customer Success, Sales), Data Storytelling Framework (Setup, Conflict, Resolution, Call to Action) com So What narrative templates, 4 Dashboard Templates completos (Executive, Marketing, Product, Customer Success), 7 SQL patterns para KPIs e alertas, Implementation Process 4 fases, 8 Common Pitfalls com solutions, BI Tool Selection guide

userStories.title: Create Task: run-growth-experiment.md
userStories.description: Task para executar experimentos de growth
acceptanceCriteria: REFERENCE: Sean Ellis como primary agent
userStories.notes: Completed: 1863 lines, ICE framework completo (scoring criteria 1-10 para Impact/Confidence/Ease, fórmulas de cálculo, exemplos detalhados, comparação com RICE/PIE, prioritization process 5 steps), experiment design template com 9 seções (problem statement, hypothesis with If/Then/Because format, metrics with primary/secondary/guardrail, design with variants/split/targeting, sample size calculation, implementation with QA checklist, analysis plan, results, learnings), sample size calculator com fórmulas estatísticas e Python code (calculate_sample_size + calculate_test_duration), statistical significance methodology completa (z-test for proportions, p-value interpretation, Type I/II errors, confidence intervals, Bayesian vs Frequentist comparison, common mistakes like peeking), learning documentation framework (template, repository structure, monthly/quarterly synthesis process), end-to-end workflow 8 phases, weekly cadence, 8 common pitfalls with solutions, QA checklist completo, glossary 20+ termos
